text: Posle bedy i gorya Allakh nizvol vam v uspokoyeniye son, kotoryy ob"yal odnu chast' iz vas - veruyushchikh, doveryayushchikh svoi dela Allakhu, - a druguyu chast' obespokoili ikh dushi: oni dumali tol'ko o sebe i nespravedlivo dumali ob Allakhe, kak pri yazychestve, i, obsuzhdaya, chto sluchilos', govorili s uprokom: "Razve v nashey vole bylo reshit' chto-libo v etom dele - dele pobedy, kotoraya nam byla obeshchana?" Skazhi im (o prorok!): "Vso delo pobedy i porazheniya prinadlezhit Allakhu. On rasporyazhayetsya delami Svoikh rabov". Oni zhe, obsuzhdaya prichiny pobedy i vnikaya v prichiny porazheniya, skryvayut v svoikh dushakh zatayennoye. Pro sebya oni govoryat: "Byl by nash vybor, my by ne vyshli v pokhod i ne poterpeli by porazheniya". To, chto sluchilos' v srazhenii "Ukhud", bylo po zhelaniyu Allakha, chtoby ispytat', chto v vashikh dushakh, i ochistit' vashi serdtsa. Poistine, Vsevedushchiy Allakh znayet i vidit to, chto vy skryvayete v vashikh serdtsakh
